= Building from source = 
The gcc makefile has not yet been updated, so vc compiler needed.
Windows:

  # Download the source for SciTE 2.25.
  # Apply <a href="http://scite-files.googlecode.com/svn-history/trunk/custom/scite_python_extend/0.5/scite_python_extend.patch">this patch</a>.
  # Copy <a href="http://scite-files.googlecode.com/svn-history/trunk/custom/scite_python_extend/0.5/scite_python_extend_patchwin32.zip">these files</a> into the appropriate directories.
  # Build SciTE (nmake -f scintilla.mak, and then nmake -f scite.mak)

To build without any Python support, define NO_PYTHON on the command line.
